name: STINGER - demo release
description:
This release only demo to play. You can download it for free. Visit my facebook page : Bagus studio for more information or you can contact me at kryptonfirewall@gmail.com

 In this game, if you kill all enemy then you're the winner. But, if you die, you'll respawn. There is only one place for demo release, but there is two weapon. You also can use health item in the arena for health booster.

If you interrest, you can donate $2 for me :)
